EI-1 (C1) -- agent-hub/mcp-servers/git_mcp/server.py:

- validate_command() checks shell metacharacters at lines 102-107
- _ensure_git_prefix() at lines 124-128: adds git prefix to command parts
- _execute_single() at lines 131-158: uses shlex.split() (line 137) and shell=False (line 146)

- git_exec() at lines 186-248: implements && stop-on-failure and || stop-on-success semantics

- import shlex added at line 14
